job_desc: Collaborating with UX/UI designers and backend developers to translate design concepts into functional and visually appealing web interfaces.
Developing and maintaining user-friendly and secure CMS interfaces using PHP with CI framework, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript with jQuery library.
Optimizing websites for performance across different browsers.
Writing unit tests to ensure code quality and maintainability.
Refactor and restructure existing codebases to improve maintainability, performance, and efficiency.
Debug and fix any issues or bugs that arise during development and post-release.
Designing and building a web API that adheres to the REST architectural style using Golang with Echo framework.
Incorporating functionalities within the project that enable users to retrieve and manipulate specific data from a database using SQL queries.
Designing the database structure and implementing it using mySQL server.
Refining and restructuring the code to enhance its efficiency, readability, and maintainability.
